mods.abstract: Correspondence between the Political Agent at Bahrain and Charles Belgrave, the Advisor to the Bahrain Government, concerning the purchase of alcohol on steamers, smuggling of alcohol and public drunkenness. The file includes a public notice (‘ ilān) from the Bahrain Government, stamped by ruler Shaikh Ḥamad bin ‘Īsá Āl Khalīfah, condemning the practice of drinking and purchasing alcohol on steamers.
